member.name: T:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder
member.summary: This class assists in building a StyleCop report.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.#ctor(Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.StyleCopReport)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ReportBuilder class.
member.param: The StyleCopReport to build.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Prevents a default instance of the ReportBuilder class from being created.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.WithAddInDirectories(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Includes the following directories in the StyleCop processor's search path for add-ins.
member.param: The directories to include.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.WithSolutionsFiles(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Adds Visual Studio Solution files to check. Visual Studio 2008 is supported.
member.param: A list of fully-qualified paths to Visual Studio solutions files.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.WithProjectFiles(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Adds Visual Studio Project files to check. Visual Studio 2008 is supported.
member.param: A list of fully-qualified paths to Visual Studio project files.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.WithDirectories(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Adds directories to check.
member.param: A list of fully-qualifieid paths to directories.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.WithFiles(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Adds files to check.
member.param: A list of fully-qualified paths to files.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.WithIgnorePatterns(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Adds a list of patterns to ignore when checking files.
member.param: A list of regular expression patterns to ignore when checking files.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.WithRecursion
member.summary: Specifies to recurse directories.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.WithRecursion(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Specifies to recurse directories.
member.param: True to recurse; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.WithProcessorSymbols(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Adds a list of processor symbols to use when performing the check.
member.param: A list of processor symboles to use when performing the check.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.WithStyleCopSettingsFile(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a StyleCop settings file to use when performing the check.
member.param: A fully-qualified path to a StyleCop settings file to use.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.WithTransformFile(System.String)
member.summary: Adds an XSL transform file to use to create an HTML report from the results of the check.
member.param: An XSL transform file to use to create an HTML report from the results of the check.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.WithOutputEventHandler(System.EventHandler{Microsoft.StyleCop.OutputEventArgs})
member.summary: Adds an event handler for when output is generated by the StyleCop processor.
member.param: The event handler to add.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.Create(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a StyleCop report.
member.param: The fully-qualified path to write the output of the report to.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.GetViolationsFile(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the path of the violations file to use.
member.param: The output XML file.
member.returns: The path of the violations file.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.Transform(System.String)
member.summary: Transforms the outputted report using an XSL transform file.
member.param: The fully-qualified path of the report to transform.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.ViolationEncountered(System.Object,Microsoft.StyleCop.ViolationEventArgs)
member.summary: Callback method for when a violation is encountered.
member.param: The object that caused this event.
The ViolationEventArgs object that describes this violation.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.AddDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Add the directory's source files to the list of files that StyleCop checks.
member.param: The fully-qualified path to the directory to add.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.AddFile(System.String,Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.StyleCopReport.SolutionsRow,Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.StyleCopReport.ProjectsRow)
member.summary: Add the given file to the list of files to be checked by StyleCop.
member.param: The fully-qualified path of the file to add.
The solutions row for this file.
The projects row for this file.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.AddSolutionFile(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a Visual Studio solution file and add its CSharp projects to the list of projects to be checked by StyleCop.
member.param: The fully-qualified path to a Visual Studio solution file.

member.name: M:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.AddProjectFile(System.String,Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.StyleCopReport.SolutionsRow)
member.summary: Adds a Visual Studio CSharp project file and adds its source files to the list of files to be checked by StyleCop.
member.param: The fully-qualified path to the project file.
The solutions row this project belongs to. Specify null if this project is not a member of a solution.

member.name: E:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.OutputGenerated
member.summary: Occurs when the stle processor outputs a message.

member.name: P:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.Report
member.summary: Gets or sets the StyleCopReport data set that is used to store the style cop results and write the results to an XML file.

member.name: P:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.SolutionFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of Visual Studio Solution files to check. Visual Studio 2008 is supported.

member.name: P:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.ProjectFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of Visual Studio Project files to check. Visual Studio 2008 is supported.

member.summary: Gets or sets a list of directories to check.

member.name: P:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.Files
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of files to check.

member.name: P:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.IgnorePatterns
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of regular expression patterns used to ignore files (if a file name matches any of the patterns, the file is not checked).

member.name: P:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.RecursionEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not directories are recursed.

member.name: P:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.ProcessorSymbols
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of processor symbols (ex. DEBUG, CODE_ANALYSIS) to be used by StyleCop.

member.name: P:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.StyleCopSettingsFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the StyleCop setting file to use.

member.name: P:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.TransformFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the XSL file used to transform the outputted XML file to an HTML report.

member.name: P:Net.SF.StyleCopCmd.Core.ReportBuilder.AddInDirectories
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of directories used by StyleCop to search for add-ins.
